Package org.hibernate.cfg

Interface C3p0Settings

All Known Subinterfaces:
AvailableSettings, JdbcSettings
All Known Implementing Classes:
Environment
public interface C3p0Settings

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    C3P0_ACQUIRE_INCREMENT
    Number of connections acquired when pool is exhausted
    static final String
    C3P0_CONFIG_PREFIX
    A setting prefix used to indicate settings that target the hibernate-c3p0 integration
    static final String
    C3P0_IDLE_TEST_PERIOD
    Idle time before a C3P0 pooled connection is validated
    static final String
    C3P0_MAX_SIZE
    Maximum size of C3P0 connection pool
    static final String
    C3P0_MAX_STATEMENTS
    Maximum size of C3P0 statement cache
    static final String
    C3P0_MIN_SIZE
    Minimum size of C3P0 connection pool
    static final String
    C3P0_TIMEOUT
    Maximum idle time for C3P0 connection pool
